column1: Little Goat Diner////We came to The Little Goat rooftop diner to start our July 4th celebration. The menu is limited to four items
column2: I'm not sure if that is for the holiday or full time. My husband and I ordered the Lots of Layers dip
column3: the Korean dog and the pork kabobs. The dip was tasty and creamy but not really my favorite. The pork kabobs were amazing. A nice soy based with grilled pineapple and other veggies. The hot dog has kimchi and fried onions
column4: it was really good. The servers are attentive without being intrusive. The roof top is an amazing space
